description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.QqtCXX2zD6hLG5t6]{Starfinder Data Jockey}

Whenever you use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp]{Computers} to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp#destroy-or-repair-system-or-module]{destroy or repair a system module}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp#detect-fake-shell]{detect a fake shell}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp#disable-or-manipulate-module]{disable or manipulate a countermeasure or module}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp#gain-root-access]{gain root access}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IqOCYDKd9NgBwowp#hack-system]{hack a computer system}, and the target computerâ€™s tier is no higher than half your level, you can roll twice and take the higher result.
